boardgame.name: E-Z RPG Core Rulebook (3rd Ed)
boardgame.description:
publisher's blurb:

EZ RPG is an easy to learn, universal tabletop roleplaying game system that allows you to play virtually anything – any character type in any setting.

Valiantly defend the planet against carnivorous dinosaurs or technologically superior aliens as they invade your hometown.

EZ RPG allows you to take on the role of an alien fighting off a dinosaur invasion or an alien riding into battle on dinosaurs to repel a zombie infestation.

The EZ RPG game system allows you to play any character class or profession in any setting or genre you can imagine. You could even play a Roman general forced to team up with a time-displaced space captain to save the earth, and the future, from a horde of demonic cows hellbent on waking up the Great Old Ones.

Choose from any genre – Fantasy, Science Fiction, Horror, Farce, Romance – and create your own adventure, whether it’s just for a night, a weekend, or an ongoing campaign.

Your imagination is the only limit.

boardgame.name: Caves of Rwenzori: The Monsoon Expansion
boardgame.description: The Monsoon Expansion brings the unpredictable, merciless power of nature to your Caves of Rwenzori adventure. As the monsoon pours and the underground rivers rise, beware! The Monsoon Expansion adds an extra 20 tiles to the game, one custom-made die and a new, dynamic but simple rule set that will keep you on the edge of your seat. Take a deep breath!

boardgame.name: The Scarlet Pimpernel: 3D Guillotine Alternative First Player Marker
boardgame.description: Kickstarter exclusive illustrated cardboard punch-out-and-assemble 3D Guillotine to serve as a first player marker in place of the one included in the game box. This item was included with Kickstarter pledges for the game, and was packaged outside of the game box.

boardgame.name: Caves of Rwenzori: Legend of the Shadow Ape
boardgame.description: Legend tells of the Shadow Ape, a wild beast hidden deep in the dark forgotten belly of the caves. When it catches your scent and roars in the darkness, take out your weapons because nothing will stop his pursuit! The Legend of the Shadow Ape expansion brings new possibilities, challenges and excitement into the game. It includes 12 newly designed weapon cards, five large custom ape meeples, one custom-made die, five magnificently-designed Shadow Ape lair tiles and a pulse-racing new rule set. Run - The Shadows Ape is coming!

boardgame.name: Rainy Season
梅雨の日/Rainy Season
boardgame.description:
The family was ready to visit the amusement park, but plans are cancelled due to weather. This is a story about an ordinary family spending time at home during rain.

Rainy Season is a narrative game that allows players to listen to the rain and live a mundane day as a child. The game is playable to finish in 40 minutes.

Source: The Game Website.

boardgame.name: A Century of Ashes
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

The adventurers seek out a trusted sage of Morgrave University to help them unlock the mysteries of the Oracle of War, but their studies risk upsetting powerful forces. Morgrave is said to be a beacon of knowledge shining from the city’s tallest towers, yet the adventurers soon learn that it can also be a deep pit of corruption.

A Four-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 5.

boardgame.name: Gallery of the Nightmare Artist
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Deep in the city of Malagard, a mad artist cackles and feverishly crafts his masterpieces.

Will you come to his show?

boardgame.name: The Red Mirage
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Silvara Steeljaw has hired a new quartermaster, but someone has kidnapped him!

A two-hour adventure for Tier 1 characters, optimized for APL 3.

boardgame.name: Brental's Roads Scholars
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Brental's Caravan Company offers a training course for adventurers seeking the vaunted title

Brental's Roads Scholar. Will you prove yourselves worthy?

A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 3.

This adventure was written for Winter War as a standalone module expanding on story elements introduced in The Tenets of Bane series.

boardgame.name: A Long Night
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

This is a simple caravan job - deliver the mysterious box to Thentia. Just one thing - don't open th ebox. And protect it from all attacks. A two-hour adventure for Tier 1 characters. Optimized for APL 3.

Here is a Side Story adventure to the Song of Fates series - ideal to get any characters into the main storyline at Tier 1, it gives you a reason you might want to go to Thentia!

boardgame.name: The Confederate High Command: American Civil War Rules
boardgame.description:
Miniature Wargame rules for the American Civil War.

33 pages including casualty tables. Includes details of how to make shell burst circles in three sizes, a canister cone, and a shrapnel spider.

Scale:
1 mini = 33 men
1mm = 1 yard

boardgame.name: Warhammer 40k: Minor Xenos
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

In the grim darkness of the far future, hordes of dark monsters and machines lurk between the stars. Great powers do battle within this twisted galaxy, ruining worlds and civilisations as they war. Between the lumbering Imperium, ruinous Chaos, mercurial Eldar, cold Necrons and the ravening hunger of the Tyranids, many forget that there are a great number of lesser powers among the stars. Xenos that are neglected, but potent in their own ways. Now, Jumper, you find yourself among them.

boardgame.name: Battleship: Pirates of the Caribbean
boardgame.description:
Set sail on a swashbuckling adventure with this Pirates of the Caribbean Edition of the classic game of strategic combat, Battleship. Command your armada of five pirate ships as you search out the enemy, fire at coordinates and score hits with custom shaped powder kegs. Use special A Pirate’s Life cards to fire multiple hits.

—description by the publisher
boardgame.boardgamefamily: Versions & Editions: Disney Theme Park Editions

boardgame.name: Pacts & Blades (Revised Edition)
boardgame.description:
Publisher blurb:

Welcome to a world of Sword and Witchcraft. Pacts and Blades rule society, raise kings and change the course of decadent empires. The spirits are talking through power and the brave translate their deadly messages into magic. What path will you choose, traveller?

Pacts and Blades is a Minimalist TTRPG inspired by the OSR movement and Michael Moorcock fantasy.

User summary:

Revised and expanded edition. Throughly revised text as the original edition suffered from poor translations.

boardgame.name: Wild Magic for Every Class
boardgame.description:
"Shouldn't every single player character have a way to introduce dynamic magical chaos into their playstyle? Wild Magic for Every Class is a new feat and accompanying set of Wild Magic Surges that answer this question: “BY VIOLET LIGHTNING, YES!”

Included in this Pay What You Want PDF, you'll discover 600 new surges spread over 12 tables - one for each core class in Dungeons & Dragons Fifth Edition. Will your Fighter sprout suction cups from their fingers and go on an unstoppable grappling spree? Will your Paladin get a terrifying false reading from their Divine Sense? Will you catch the money bunny!? Each surge provides a whimsical disruption of the status quo, a unique mechanical outcome to react to, or both!

Every party is unique, and as always this supplement is written with that in mind. Also included are variant rules and play advice to help ensure that introducing more randomness doesn’t mean detracting from other folks’ fun. Whether you want to integrate Wild Magic as a story element from the start or simply add some spice to an existing character, you’ll find a solution. Both social and in-character guidelines are provided, and the hundreds of surges listed can be easily replaced piecemeal or even remixed if you write your own!

If you or someone you know are the kind of player that can’t get enough of those hectic d100 Wild Magic rolls, then this is your time to shine. But even if not, Wild Magic also works as a great temporary effect caused by an enchantment, a curse, or a magically unstable environment. This supplement fits any setting with an unpredictable source of magic, and any character with or without an available feat slot."

(Author Summary)

boardgame.name: Candyland: Willy Wonka & The Chocolate Factory
boardgame.description:
All your favorite locations from the classic film Willy Wonka & the Chocolate Factory come to life on the custom illustrated Candy Land game board. Be the first player to reach the Wonkavator by landing on the multi-colored rainbow space at the end of the path to win!

Contents:
1 Custom Willy Wonka and the Chocolate Factory Game Board
66 Cards
4 Oompa Loompa Movers
Rules

- description by the publisher
boardgame.boardgamefamily: Books: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory

boardgame.name: National Parks Get Wild
boardgame.description:
National Parks: Get Wild is an edge-of-your-seat dice game, where players race to restore ecosystems by returning animals to their respective parks. Roll the dice as fast as you can to be the one to have a park with only the required animals before other players. Showcasing 12 iconic National Parks with custom illustrations and fun facts about each park and the 6 featured animals, players will learn while having fun. It’s a wild dexterity game that features dice-rolling, habitat restoration fun for the whole family!﻿

–description by the publisher

boardgame.name: Kajko i Kokosz: Szkoła Latania
boardgame.description:
Kajko i Kokosz - Szkoła Latania is a card game connected to the popular comic book series created by Janusz Christa. Comic books about Kajko and Kokosz are enthusiastically read by children and adults.

However, the card game is not only for fans of the series. The game has two variants and works great both with the group of 7-year-olds as well as with older players. In order to defeat all the opponents, the player has to use the strength of his characters, which is printed on the cards. The player who has the least cards in their stack at the end of the game is the winner.

The box contains 55 character cards, 7 tiles, and 2 flying tokens.

Part of the series of "backpack games" from Egmont Polska.

boardgame.name: Check Out!
Check Out! The Convenience Store Game
boardgame.description:
It's the start of the day, and you are late for work! You rush to your favorite convenience store to grab some breakfast, but unfortunately, it's everyone else's favorite, too! The clock is ticking, and speed is of the essence! Grab what you can before others can get their grubby hands on it, and be the first in queue to check out to get priority access to the sweet, sweet over-the-counter deals! Will you be able to fill your growling hunger and get to work on time?

In Check Out!, players roll dice simultaneously and try to purchase food and drinks that are laid out on the table. Players can choose to keep re-rolling or "check out" by moving their unused dice to the check-out counter in queue. The last player still rolling is forced to check out. Players can now use their unused dice to exchange for limited promotional deals to earn more points in the order they are queued. Any unused dice at the end of the turn can be exchanged for money which can be used at the fifth bonus round for a comeback!

The players with the most points wins!

—description from publisher

boardgame.name: Star Wars: X-Wing (Second Edition) – Damage Decks
boardgame.description:
Whether your ships are hit by blasters or proton torpedoes, the damage they take in a game of X-Wing is normally tracked by the standard damage deck included in the X-Wing Core Set. With these damage decks, however, you can personalize the look of your squadron by replacing this deck with one that matches the colors of your chosen faction.

Each deck contains a complete set of thirty-three illustrated damage cards that correspond to those in the standard damage deck. While the text of these cards might match, their graphic design makes it clear that your squadron belongs to a particular faction. But these decks do more than simply indicate where your loyalties lie. The cards themselves clearly pinpoint the damaged portion of your ship in Aurebesh on a diagnostic display of one of your faction's starfighters.

— Description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Mainports
boardgame.description:
Welcome to Europe! Discover its mainports and all the opportunities this true EURO GAME offers.

Close profitable deals, stock up on fuel and embark on your first journey across the European continent.
Ship grain from Lisbon to St. Petersburg and pick up some coal in Hamburg to deliver the cargo in Rotterdam. Will you choose to travel through the rivers or can you make a short cut across the seas? Smart planning of routes can be decisive as well as good timing on the rondel. Pock up some extra cash if you come across the flourishing mainport! Expand your enterprise with new ships and the latest technologies to get a head start to your opponents.

—description from the back of the box

boardgame.name: Sagani
サガニ
사가니
boardgame.description:
Welcome to Sagani where achieving harmony between the natural elements of Earth, Water, Air and Fire is the central goal of the spirits that populate this world. These spirits spend most of their time in their vessel-like dwellings. But when the elements are put in balance, the spirits emerge from their vessels and show themselves in their full form.

Each spirit embodies one of the four elements and influences the harmony between them. In Sagani, as you and your opponents create this colorful, harmonious world by employing your Sound discs, the spirits become fully visible. Every spirit that shows itself also brings you a step closer to victory.

—description from the publisher

Sagani - Der neue Geniestreich von Uwe Rosenberg Sagani ist ein Plättchen-Legespiel, bei dem ihr versucht, Naturgeister aus ihren Gefäßen hervorzulocken. Die Geister streben danach, die Harmonie zwischen den Elementen Feuer, Wasser, Erde und Luft aufrecht zu erhalten. Sind die Elemente um sie herum in der richtigen Balance, treten die Geister aus ihren Gefäßen hervor und zeigen sich in ihrer vollen Gestalt. Legt die Geistplättchen geschickt an und verschiebt die Klangschalen, mit denen sich die Geister Botschaften zusenden, wenn die Harmonie der Elemente wiederhergestellt wird und lasst so ein farbenprächtiges und harmonisches Gebilde in eurer Auslage entstehen. Sagani stammt aus der Feder des deutschen Erfolgsautors Uwe Rosenberg, der schon seit vielen Jahren sein Händchen für geniale Spielideen unter Beweis stellt (Bohnanza, Agricola, Nova Luna und vieles mehr).

boardgame.name: Grimtooth's Tomb of the Warhammer (T&T)
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Can you go where no Trolls dare to tread?

Long ago, the elves killed Grimtooth's father in a great battle, They hid the troll leader's body and his mystic warhammer somewhere in the vast plains beyond the Forest of Doom. After Years of searching, Grimtooth the Troll has finally located his Father's tomb, but the elves have magically rigged it so that no troll can enter. Now Grimtooth (ruler of his own kingdom Trapsylvania) is looking for a party of foolhardy adventurers to enter Grimfang's Tomb and return with the legendary warhammer.

This adventure has been converted for use in Tunnels & Trolls and includes a copy of the T&T Mini-Rules, allowing Grimtooth fans learn T&T as well get this GM adventure.

Originally written by Ken St Andre & Steve Crompton it was published by Goodman Games as a DCC rpg adventure. We've added some more art and more details on where in Trollworld this adventure takes place. (If you've played Vaults of K'Horror this adventure is nearby and makes for a worthy continuations of that campaign.) Note that this adventure is for higher level T&T characters of 9th level & up - so you have been warned! "Grimtooth is not for sissies bub!" (as the Troll himself might say)

boardgame.name: The Tomb of Ongarro
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

A brand new adventure for the Far Away Land RPG... The Tomb of Ongarro!

The dead lie buried with their secrets… and their treasure. Journey into the Tomb of Ongarro to discover the secrets of an ancient king as you battle monsters and mayhem. Will your party succeed in discovering the secrets within or will the tomb be their final resting place alongside the old king?

This adventure features...

Brand new encounters
Weird story with twisted love
Location descriptions of the village, swamp, and tomb
Modular design that allows you to drop the adventure in wherever you like in your FAL campaign
Cool new artwork
An extra cheap price tag that allows you to get in on the action at no cost!
boardgame.rpgseries: Far Away Land RPG Adventure Module

boardgame.name: The Zero Gravity Olympics
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

This is a Cepheus Engine Adventure.

Every ten years coalitions and worlds in the Sonora sector hold a sporting event unlike any other. The Zero Gravity Olympics are a true test of skill, endurance and agility. Worlds from across the sector send athletes. The events are taped and distrubted across the sector and far beyond. Worlds in the Frontiers of Space vie for superiority. The games are a matter of pride. Medal counts are followed daily by citizens of the Frontiers.

But all is not fun and games. A few individuals have plans to make the games a different sort of spectacle. They intend to bring terror to the games and to the entire sector.

boardgame.name: Die Säulen der Erde
boardgame.description:
Die Säulen der Erde (Sonderausgabe) is a special edition of the game of the same name Die Säulen der Erde / The Pillars of the Earth published in 2006 The Pillars of the Earth.

In addition to the base game, this edition also comes with the two official extensions: The Pillars of the Earth: Expansion Set and The Pillars of the Earth: New Craftsmen

boardgame.name: Food Chain Island
Isla Animal
L'Île des Prédateurs
Die Schmatzinsel
boardgame.description:
On this forgotten island in a tiny corner of the ocean the animals are hungry! Your goal is to influence the wildlife - and arrange their meals - so there is only one animal left!

In this game, you will take as many turns as possible with a goal of only having one land animal card left on the table after starting with a grid of 16. On each turn, you must move one animal to eat another smaller, adjacent animal. If you cannot move an animal to eat another, the game ends.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Shingo!
boardgame.description:
Shingo is a set collecting game wherein 2-6 players try to score points by adding counters to a playmat that correspond to the same symbol and location on cards that they build a hand of during the game.

The game starts with a stack of cards being placed face down in the middle of the table, and three cards being peeled off and laid face up adjacent to the stack.

On each player's turn they select a card from the three face up ones and add it to their hand, and after doing so add a counter or counters to their playmat, according to whether they have a pink star in that location on the card they've picked up. If they have stars in multiple locations on the card, they add a counter to each of those locations on their playmat, whether or not they have a counter there already from a previous turn, and regardless of whether or not there is a nought or a cross in that location on another card.

Once every player has a hand of seven cards, the game ends and the players add up their points. For more info on scoring and other points, please follow the link to the rules file.

boardgame.name: Copeline Class Merchant Vessel
Copeline-class Merchant Vessel
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Best of the best!

The Copeline-class merchant vessel is quickly becoming the most popular ship in Earth Sector! Created in 2348 by Corolys Shipbuilding Company, the ship has overtaken such venerable designs as the Rucker and Atlas among merchants in Earth Sector.

The Copeline is a 300-tonne ship with modules which can be switched out to make the ship into a freighter, a passenger liner, a scout, or a combination of all of those! This versatility has made it the chosen ship for independent operators and small shipping corporations.

Come and see why the Copeline has become so popular!

boardgame.name: Les Aventuriers du Rail: Amsterdam
Ticket to Ride: Amsterdam
Wsiąść do Pociągu: Amsterdam
Zug um Zug: Amsterdam
boardgame.description:
Ticket to Ride: Amsterdam features the familiar gameplay from the Ticket to Ride game series — collect cards, claim routes, draw tickets — but on a map of 17th century Amsterdam that allows you to complete a game in no more than 15 minutes.

You are in the middle of the Gouden Eeuw, the Dutch Golden Age. Amsterdam is the beating heart of global trade and the wealthiest city on Earth. Goods from around the world are piling up on the docks, in ship holds, in warehouses, and on the banks of its countless canals. You mean to profit from this!

Each player starts with a supply of 16 carts, two transportation cards in hand, and one or two trade contract tickets that show locations in the Amsterdam market. On a turn, you either draw two transportation cards from the deck or the display of five face-up cards (or you take one face-up wild card, which counts as all six colors in the game); or you claim a route on the board by discarding cards that match the color of the route being claimed (with any set of cards allowing you to claim a gray route); or you draw two trade contract tickets and keep at least one of them.

Whenever you complete a route that has carts depicted on it, with these primarily being on the perimeter of the city, you claim a merchandise bonus card.

Players take turns until someone has no more than two carts in their supply, then each player takes one final turn, including the player who triggered the end of the game. Players then sum their points, scoring points for the routes that they've claimed during the game, the trade contract tickets that they've completed (by connecting the two locations on a ticket by a continuous line of their carts), and their standing among those who hold merchandise bonus cards. Whoever holds the most cards collects 8 points, with other players collecting fewer points. You lose points for any uncompleted contract tickets, then whoever has the high score wins!

boardgame.name: Age of Ambition: Fantasy Roleplaying in an Age of Promise or Peril
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Welcome to a brave new age of promise or peril...
Age of Ambition is a fantasy roleplaying game set in a world rapidly leaving the traditional fantasy milieu behind, where magical and technological advancements are challenging the long-standing social order, and where the heroes help guide the world into a brave new era of promise or peril.

So strap on your breastplate and pick up your pistol. There are discoveries to make, wrongs to right, tyrants to overthrow and new social orders to trial.

Age of Ambition is a complete fantasy roleplaying game using the Saga Machine system. Its features include:


A lifepath character creation system, including birth omens, life events and careers that connect each character to the world at large.
A fully-realized fantasy setting, including social dynamics, history, magic, politics and plot hooks galore!
Support for a wide spectrum of power and influence, from peasant revolutionaries to the leaders of nations.
Systems for personal ambitions, influence, social change, bonds, magic, invention, combat, social status and more!

boardgame.name: Nusfjord: Solo Challenge
boardgame.description:
The Solo Challenge is a print and play consisting of 22 cards which will later be included in the Salmon Deck expansion (which will consist of 44 new buildings and 1 new elder).

Use these cards and see how many points you can score with them.

boardgame.name: 7 Csoda Párbaj: Agora
7 Cudów Świata: Pojedynek – Agora

boardgame.description:
7 Wonders Duel: Agora features a new board called the Senate, comprising six separate chambers that provide players with benefits once they take possession of the area. Players can obtain a Senate chamber by taking senator cards. Should any player successfully take control of the majority of Senate chambers then they automatically win the game.

1 Senate board
24 Influence cubes (12 bronze and 12 silver)
13 Senator cards (7 Politicians and 6 Conspirators)
2 Wonder cards
16 Conspiracy cards
16 Decree tokens
2 Progress tokens
4 Military tokens
1 score pad
1 Player Aid card
1 rulebook

boardgame.name: Scarlet Nexus
boardgame.description:
In a far distant future, humanity’s last hope falls into the hands of an elite group of psionic soldiers, who battle an invincible threat known as Others.
Unravel the mysteries of a Brain Punk future caught between technology and psychic abilities in SCARLET NEXUS.

boardgame.name: Hugin Class Trader
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Intended as a new series of quick ship books, hopefully I will collect them all in one volume once I get enough together (along with some extras of course)

This QSF contains specs, deckplans and some detail on the Hugin (or Huginn) Class Trader.
Designed for the Cepheus Engine, but could be used in just about any scifi game.

Also included are seperate files so you can print the deckplans out to bigger scales and an A2 poster of the cover art.

boardgame.name: Roguish Archetype: Street Warrior
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

“It’s our job to protect our own. Let them come. This is our territory and if they have to learn that the hard way, then we’re the ones to teach them.”
- Quinn Jerova, Jerova Family matriarch.

There are areas in cities where the law must be avoided. Where they’re either too corrupt to safeguard the people who need their protection or where the people who could use protection are operating outside of the law themselves. Street Warriors fill the void that’s left when those around them, for whatever reason, can’t depend on legal means to save them. They’re heroes who rise up from forgotten neighborhoods to defend against gangs and criminal elements who threaten their homes when no one else will.

boardgame.name: Bright Memory Infinite
boardgame.description: Combine a wide variety of skills and abilities to unleash dazzling combo attacks. Bright Memory: Infinite is set in a sprawling, futuristic metropolis in the year 2036. A strange phenomenon for which scientists can find no explanation has occurred in the skies around the world. The Supernatural Science Research Organization (SRO) has sent agents out to various regions to investigate this phenomenon.

boardgame.name: DIRT 5
boardgame.description:
DIRT 5 writes a new chapter in the legacy of DiRT – bolder and braver than ever before. Travel the globe, tame the most incredible off-road machines with your friends, and be part of a vibe that delivers big on epic action, pure expression, and unbridled style.

Get your first taste of DIRT 5 in our announce trailer, all captured in-game, showcasing wheel-to-wheel action, stunning environments and a brand new take on amplified racing.

boardgame.name: CHORUS
Chorvs
boardgame.description:
Become Nara and Forsaken, her sentient starfighter, on a compelling, personal journey of redemption. Unlock devastating weapons and mind-bending abilities in a true evolution of the space-combat shooter. Explore breath-taking interstellar vistas, ancient temples and venture beyond our waking reality. Outgun, outwit, and outmaneuver your enemies in an epic quest to free the galaxy from oppression.

A JOURNEY OF REDEMPTION – Become Nara, an ace pilot facing her haunted past, and Forsaken, her sentient ship. Their quest for redemption will take them across the galaxy and beyond the boundaries of reality to unite resistance forces and stop the Circle and their leader, the Great Prophet, at all costs.

boardgame.name: Call of the Sea
boardgame.description: Call of the Sea is an otherworldly adventure game set in the 1930s South Pacific. Explore a lush island paradise and puzzle out the secrets of a lost civilization in the hunt for your husband’s missing expedition.

boardgame.description: The Ascent is a solo and co-op action RPG set in a cyberpunk world. The mega corporation that owns you and everyone, The Ascent Group, has just collapsed. Can you survive without it?

boardgame.name: Decision at Kasserine: Rommel's Last Chance – Designer Signature Edition
boardgame.description:
Decision at Kasserine: Rommel's Last Chance, Designer Signature Edition, marks the return of a true wargaming classic by Vance von Borries first published in 1983, faithfully remastered and updated with this all-new, supersized edition. Hailed by many as of the premier entry in the popular Series: Battles for North Africa (3W) series, this two-player operational level simulation covers the WWII German and Italian offensive in central Tunisia which took place in mid-February 1943.

This edition of Decision at Kasserine features a super-sized map and counters and is another Classic Reborn! by Compass.

On the morning of February 19, the Germans launched their attack through the Kasserine Pass. Heavy damage was inflicted on the Allied forces, causing the Allies to retreat 50 miles. Despite these losses and setbacks, Allied forces and reserves managed to regroup and hold on February 22, launching a massive artillery attack to halt the German advances. Faced with his own overextended supply lines and an Allied force that was now being reinforced, Rommel withdrew and ordered all Axis units to concentrate on defending the German-held coastal areas. Had the German-Italian army succeeded, the war in North Africa would have been lengthened, thus possibly delaying the Allied invasion of Europe.This offensive was the last major Axis effort which offered a realistic chance to reverse their fortunes in North Africa.

This Designer Signature edition of the classic Vance von Borries game goes beyond a mere culmination of the forward strides made with subsequent games published in the series; it now features a major update to the game system that will be implemented in future game releases of the popular Series: Battles for North Africa (3W) series. In terms of superior physical presentation, all aspects have been upgraded, including super-sized components; larger game map and 5/8" counters. Some of the enhancements made in this edition include:

• Super-sized components feature 5/8” counters and two game maps with large hexes
• Game map information is updated and includes all-new map artwork
• Supporting charts convey more information at a glance for ease of play
• Enhanced ergonomics are built into the set up and reinforcement charts
• Updated the Order of Battle based on new information and analysis
• Fixed the original deployment and OoB based on archival information
• The rules treatment is all-new with a full re-write backed by many illustrations, an index, and clarifications and examples of play to reduce potential questions. Some rules were simplified, others enhanced.
• Redesigned treatment on air units, armor bonus, and strongpoints in combat and a clarified treatment on the artillery rules
• New rules cover infiltration movement, combat evasion and retreat options
• New optional rules cover mountain units, certain reinforcements, Allied artillery concentrations, and considerable Allied command problems
• Many all-new historical notes can be found throughout the rules presentation
• Three new scenarios have been added

Product Information:

Complexity: 6 out of 10
Solitaire Suitability: 6 out of 10 (no hidden units; variable German victory conditions)
Time Scale: 12 hours per turn
Map Scale: two miles per hex
Unit Scale: companies and battalions, artillery batteries or groups
Players: one to two, best with two
Playing Time: 3-8 hours depending upon scenario

Components:

Two map sheets
Three countersheets (5/8" size)
Rules booklet with updated Historical Notes
Three player aid cards
Three order of appearance display cards (Axis & Allied)
One six-sided die
Box and Lid

boardgame.name: Disney: The Haunted Mansion – Call of the Spirits Game
boardgame.description:
Disney’s beloved The Haunted Mansion comes to life — err, death — in this hauntingly fun family board game! Explore all the classic rooms of the ghost-infested manor, from the festivities-filled Ballroom to the Attic and out to the Graveyard and beyond in search of spirits. Beware, though, of the Hitchhiking Ghosts, who are notorious for “following you home” as that may spell your doom in the end!

Players gain points by socializing with ghosts around the Haunted Mansion. Players move around the mansion by rotating the Endless Hallway around Madame Leota's Séance Room, collecting Ghost cards in front of them in sets, each of which are worth different point values. Players want to avoid Haunt cards, as the most “haunted” player will lose points. The player with the most points at the end wins.

-description from publisher

boardgame.name: FeWa-Würfelspiel
boardgame.description:
The players start at space 1 and have to reach space 50. Movement is determined by a die. If a pawn reaches an occupied space, the other pawn has to start anew from space 1. On some spaces the player learns, why it is a good idea to use FeWa laundry detergent and gets a reward for using FeWa or a penalty for beeing stupid enough to use another product.

This is a promotional game for FeWa laundry detergent (invented in 1932,today it's called "Perwoll"). The washing woman "Johanna" was created in 1938. Seems the figure wasn't named yet when the game was published.

—user summary

boardgame.name: Gaggle of Geese
boardgame.description:
A free PNP game for one player. You are the leader of a flock of Geese heading south for the winter. Lead your flock through the Hunters and avoid the lurking Eagles to reach the safety of the Marshlands.

You have six Geese that you must guide to safety by moving them each turn towards the Marshlands at the bottom of the gameboard. In your path are six Hunters who try to shoot you and eight Eagles who try to eat you. Each turn, you use dice rolls as an AI to determine their movements. If they reach any of your Geese, that bird is captured and removed from the board.

You win if at least one of your Geese reach safety in the Marshlands by successfully passing through the Hunters and Eagles. Variable levels of difficulty can be set by adjusting the number of Eagles on the board.

—description from the designer

The Grognard Files

boardgame.name: Bulls Bears
boardgame.description:
The board game bulls-bears about the stockpile. In the game you have to buy and sell stocks. The one who buys more than 50% of the shares wins. This is a board game with website interface. Website of the game is needed for make game mechanics easier.

At the beginning of the game all players have the same amount of money and shares. Player can buy or sell min 1 and max 9 shares on the turn. The share price changes depending on the players' decision. If more shares were sold than purchased, the price falls; if the opposite is true, the price rises.

After a few days of trading, the shareholders' meeting begins. Participants choose the amount of dividends.

The game ends when one of the participants buys more than 50 shares or becomes bankrupt.

boardgame.name: Star Conflict: Insurgency
boardgame.description:
The Galaxy is at war. An alliance of several High Lords of the Interstellar Empire has rebelled against the Em -
peror, in an attempt to seize power for themselves. After years of conflict, the loyalists have managed to defeat
the majority of the insurgent forces. The few remaining insurgents have gone into hiding in a secret base, where
they are now rebuilding their forces. Given enough time, they will be able to rally enough support to launch an-
other full-scale rebellion and defeat the Emperor once and for all. The loyalists are set to find the base and de-
stroy the last remnants of the opposition before this happens.

Star Conflict: Insurgency is a free print and play asymmetric wargame for two players, taking approximately 30
to 60 minutes to play.

One player takes control of the loyalists and one player of the insurgents. The loyalist player’s goal is to locate
and conquer the hidden insurgent base. The insurgent player’s goal is to survive long enough to gather enough
support to overthrow the Emperor. Both players will muster armies, fight battles, and expand their galactic do-
main in order to reach their aim. The loyalists are more powerful and organized, but the insurgents have time and
the element of surprise on their side.

—description from the designer

This can be played as a stand alone game. It was also made to be mixed with Crazier Eights: Olympus, or any other version of the game other than the first edition.

—description from the designer

Promo card representing the portable batcomputer that gives re-rolls on complex thought and manipulation actions.

Included with the The Overlord #4
boardgame.boardgamecompilation: Compendium: The Overlord – Tome IV (fan expansion to Batman)

boardgame.name: The Lost City
boardgame.description:
Publisher Blurb:

An adventure for levels 1-7

Goodman Games expands its partnership with Wizards of the Coast with the fourth release in the Original Adventures Reincarnated line!

Lost in the sweeping dunes of an expansive desert! Your band, separated from its caravan during a sandstorm, stumbles upon the ancient ruins of a city, mostly buried in the sands. One of the structures, a prominent step pyramid, juts above the sandy wastes, beckoning for exploration. There must be untold riches secluded inside its dusty halls and crypts. But, more importantly, you desperately hope there is water, food, and relief from the unrelenting sun to be found therein. For without those basic necessities, your band will succumb not to some fell beast, but this harsh environment instead. Onward, as all heroes wish to meet their end while swinging a sword or unleashing arcane magic!

So, check your weapons, adjust your armor, and inventory your precious remaining food and water supplies. High adventure awaits in the underground chambers and tiers of a pyramid covered by the sands of time. But what of the peculiar masked humans who rule the upper levels of the pyramid? And what of the dark master that rules these humans from the lower levels of the forsaken halls? An adventure inspired by the classic pulp stories such as Robert E. Howard’s famous Conan story Red Nails….

This tome is an homage to the original dungeon crawl and sandbox setting first explored decades ago as B4: The Lost City. Herein, you will find high-quality scans of the original Basic edition adventure module, plus commentary by a variety of gaming luminaries. This includes an interview with Harold Johnson, the module’s original developer, who also discusses his work on playtesting, Dragonlance, and other TSR titles.

Also, herein is a full fifth edition conversion of the original adventure as well as brand new additional dungeons, such as the fully developed lower pyramid, additional details on the Lost City itself, and the dreaded Lower Catacombs. Although converted for the most recent edition, this material is presented in a distinct early 1980s style, tone, and presentation. This is the perfect setting for a fully playable fifth edition mini-campaign, starting at 1st level and reaching all the way up to 7th level or beyond.

boardgame.name: Port Arthur
Red Sun Blue Cross
boardgame.description:
Operational game of the naval battles fought around Japan, China, and Russia during the Russo-Japanese War. Uses a similar system to War at Sea, but with some wrinkles.

(from BGG user)
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2020 Charles S. Roberts Best Late GunPowder Era Board Wargame Nominee

boardgame.name: Edge of Darkness: Guilds Power Pack Expansion
boardgame.description:
The Guilds Power Pack consists of 4 double-sided Location boards; 1 board for each Guild, with two different Guild Locations and 16 Guild Advancement Starter Slips which replace the default Guild Advancement Starter Slips which come with the Base Game.

Each Guild Location adds asymmetric starting conditions for the Guild and a special ability available only to that Guild. The new Citizens & Patricians on the Guild Advancement Starter Slips provide new abilities and interact with this Location.

Contents:
4 guild location boards
16 card advancements
56 influential/goodwill plastic tokens
56 influential/goodwill cardboard tokens
1 cloth bag (to replace the leatherette bag)
1 rulebook

Related:
The Guilds Power Pack was released in addition to the Cliffs of Coldharbor expansion in the same Kickstarter campaign. As of January 2022 it does not appear to be available separately at retail
boardgame.boardgameaccessory: Edge of Darkness: Saim Lab Insert

boardgame.name: FAITH Equipment (I)
Tools of the Trade Gear Deck
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Equip your character with the powerful gear pieces you can find the the cards of this deck. All the information you need to use each piece of gear is contained within its card and the illustration will provide a nice visual reference.

boardgame.name: Basic Equipment Gear Deck
FAITH Equipment (II)
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Equip your character with the powerful gear pieces you can find the the cards of this deck. All the information you need to use each piece of gear is contained within its card and the illustration will provide a nice visual reference.

boardgame.name: FAITH NPC Deck (I)
Nefarious Folk NPC Deck
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Create fascinating confrontations for your players using the NPCs found in this deck. All the information you need to use each NPC is contained within its card and the illustration will provide an interesting visual reference for you and your players.

boardgame.name: A Baton in Both Hands
boardgame.description:
A set of solo wargame rules that were designed for the horse and musket period but could be used for others.

Rules were designed so that any type of engagement could be played at any figure scale or basing type.

The player controls both sides in a solo wargame.

boardgame.name: Common Foes NPC Deck
FAITH NPC Deck (II)
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Create fascinating confrontations for your players using the NPCs found in this deck. All the information you need to use each NPC is contained within its card and the illustration will provide an interesting visual reference for you and your players.

boardgame.name: FAITH Mixed Deck (II)
The One Percent Gear & NPC Deck
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

The universe of FAITH is full of powerful characters with their own set of goals and motivations, as well as unique possessions they use to further their agendas. In this deck, you will find the unique, named characters from the FAITH: Core Book, as well as some of the equipment you may be able to obtain from them, be it in trade or as loot...

boardgame.name: Grazilaxx's Guide to Ancestry
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Grazilaxx’s Guide to Ancestry provides a new and innovative way to use “race” in your 5e games. No longer do you need to settle for the restrictive language of race and tethered ability score increases!

boardgame.name: Grazilaxx's Guide to Aquatic Ancestries
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Grazilaxx's Guide to Aquatic Ancestries converts some of the most popular water-based races into the ground-breaking, best selling system Grazilaxx's Guide to Ancestry - a modular, customizable race-building system that gets rid of the baggage of the core system.

boardgame.name: Grazilaxx's Guide to Undead Ancestries
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Grazilaxx's Guide to Undead Ancestries converts some of the most popular undead races into the ground-breaking, best selling system Grazilaxx's Guide to Ancestry - a modular, customizable race-building system that gets rid of the baggage of the core system.

boardgame.name: Grazilaxx's Guide to Fey Ancestries
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Grazilaxx's Guide to Fey Ancestries converts some of the most popular fey races into the ground-breaking, best selling system Grazilaxx's Guide to Ancestry - a modular, customizable race-building system that gets rid of the baggage of the core system.

boardgame.name: Grazilaxx's Guide to Plant Ancestries
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Grazilaxx's Guide to Plant Ancestries converts some of the most popular plant races into the ground-breaking, best selling system Grazilaxx's Guide to Ancestry - a modular, customizable race-building system that gets rid of the baggage of the core system.

Publisher's blurb:

The May 8, 2020 Friday Enhanced Map product contains a multi-layered PDF (allowing the options of white or black backgrounds, numbered or non-numbered areas, secret doors on or off, and grid or no grid) and a zip file with all relevant map files as individual jpg images.

boardgame.name: Pirate's Gate
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

A heavy fortification has been built into the mountainous cliff-side, the barrels of cannons protruding from small openings. Statues of beautiful angelic figures stand upon pillars of stone and iron while cages designed to house criminals hang from the towers. A massive wooden and iron gate bars the main entrance. The seas are still and colorful fish playfully dart in and out of rocky crevices.

Inside stone staircases spiral up into barracks, cooking and storage areas. The fortress allows for some living space, a small library as well as personal quarters and two cells for prisoners.

boardgame.name: Wyvern's Rest Fortress
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

A heavy fortification has been built into the mountainous cliff-side, the barrels of cannons protruding from small openings above the forested lands below. Statues of beautiful angelic figures stand upon pillars of stone and iron while cages designed to house criminals hang from the towers. A massive wooden and iron gate bars the main entrance.

Inside stone staircases spiral up into barracks, cooking and storage areas. The fortress allows for some living space, a small library as well as personal quarters and two cells for prisoners.

boardgame.name: Icebound Fortress
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

A heavy fortification has been built into the snow covered cliff-side, the barrels of cannons protruding from small openings. Statues of beautiful angelic figures stand upon pillars of stone and iron while cages designed to house criminals hang from the towers. A massive wooden and iron gate bars the main entrance. The seas lightly toss, and sheets of thick ice that have been broken bob and weave in the small waves.

Inside stone staircases spiral up into barracks, cooking and storage areas. The fortress allows for some living space, a small library as well as personal quarters and two cells for prisoners.

Adventure Seed

News from the north has spread that a new king has come into power over the tribes of the northern peoples and that they intend to lay siege to the fortress of the great gates before heading further south to raid the kingdoms for slaves and gold.

You’ve been tasked with assisting in holding the fortress should it come to that, while others have been sent out in a vessel with a diplomat to try and make peace with this new king before any blood has been shed.

However two days later a small armada of northern ships are sighted on the horizon setting anchor. During that night an alarm is rung. The gates have been breached by a small force of northerners and they’re fighting to kill. Both docks have been taken by the northerners and the gates are wide open but un-damaged, for it seems they were opened from the inside!

After the alarm goes off some of the guards manage to close the gates again but not before larger sailing vessels begin their attack on the fortresses exterior. With the guards busy you’ll need to defend both sides of the inner fortress and protect those firing the cannons from the barbarians that have assaulted the docks.

After the attacking ships have been dealt with and the barbarians have been slain, it will be time to root out a potential traitor who opened the gates to these savages!

boardgame.name: Port of Inglesford
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

An old wooden pier leads you over the clear waters and to the castle walls, large pillars hold up a grand round dome above while below lies a small shrine. The lower portion of a tower is being used as an archive of information containing all goods ever shipped here or exported as well as all guests that have arrived.

Market stalls line the walls where goods and wares are sold, colorful rugs are placed above the damp ground and a holding cell is nearby to deal with any troublemakers. Above are multiple battlements that lead to a guards tower and quarters, as well as tower for the lord’s advisor and the lord’s quarters themselves which is furnished with many bookcases and barrels of fine wine.

boardgame.name: Derelict Pool
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

This full color battlemap is the 502nd of a series featuring various terrains. This installment of the battlemap series features an empty and abandoned pool.

The map is 28 x 30 squares in size, with each 1 inch square scaled to represent 5 feet. It is provided in 12 segments, which need to be assembled, in a single PDF using the letter format.

The product has been updated to include a large gridless JPG image of the map, intended for use with VTT software. It is 2016x2160 pixels in size at 72dpi.

boardgame.name: 100 Overheard Cyber City Chatter V 06.0
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

The city overwhelms the senses. Neon against rainy black sky, reflecting in the puddles. Smells of things out of the sewers mix with the deep fried offerings of street vendors. Stale sweat so heavy in the air you can taste it. The most overwhelming of all is the sound… especially the endless sea of chatter. This list provides 100 random things that a group of heroes might hear in a cyberpunk city setting. Some things are worth taking note of, other things are just verbal garbage.

boardgame.name: Mushroom Forest
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

8 fungal maps created at 25x25 squares in both mushroom filled and empty along with bits pieces and additional variations. Great for exploring the underdark or any other large mushroom filled caverns of your imagination. Intended for virtual table tops.

boardgame.name: Frozen Decor
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Have and idea for a well decorated icy setting and can’t bring yourself to let it go? I’ve got a decoration kit for you, provided the cold never bothered you anyways. Goes great with my other berg building kit.

Intended for use with virtual table tops.

boardgame.name: Berg Builder
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Various pieces to construct your own icebergs, glaciers, and other icy settings.

No life is not like a hurricane, that’s a burg not a berg. Also no ducks. No race cars, lasers, or aeroplanes. Just ice. Lots of ice. Goes great with my other berg decoration kit.

Intended for use with virtual table tops.

boardgame.name: Fantasy Tomb
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Map making can be time-consuming and sometimes frustrating for GMs, especially GMs with limited time to begin with. In our new 'GM's Maps' range, we will be providing a range of pre-made maps for you to use in your games.

Included in this product you will find a PDF with a key for the map, several versions of the map (full colour, basic old school with grid and without grid), and 11 adventure hooks and ideas set in the Cinema that you can develop into full adventures.

Sample Adventure Ideas from This Product:

1. Escape from the Warlords Tomb

The PCs are slaves or vanquished enemies who were sealed, alive, inside the warlord's tomb when he was laid to rest. Powerful magi inscribed upon the tomb walls will turn them into undead guardians when they die. Unsurprisingly, however, the PCs have no intention of dying here and becoming eternally damned undead guards to that psycho. So they have determined to do all they can to escape the tomb, using only their wits, guile, and whatever they can find in here that might help them.

The PCs begin on the lower level and must find their way out of the tomb, defeating traps, other guardians, and trying to figure out how to use what they can find to get past the great seals at the tomb's entrance. IT seems unlikely that everyone will make it out alive.

2. There Has To Be A Better Way

Once again the old king is dead and a new candidate must be chosen. By long tradition, however, the new king must be chosen by the revenant of the first king of the realm, as was his wish. Each time a king passes all the candidates to replace them must be assembled, the priests must unseal the first king's tomb, and the assembled candidates must venture through the labyrinth of traps and guardians to confront the wraith of the old king who will select one to be the new ruler. Of course, priests must accompany them to witness the choice.

This time the PCs are the candidates and the acolytes sent into the tomb for the choosing.

boardgame.name: Inukami!
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

Welcome Jumper, To the world of Inukami! This world is much like the one you first started in, except for that magic and yokai are real. The story is centered around a 20-something year old Keita, the black sheep of his family after he receives Youko, his Inukami!

boardgame.name: Deep Morphean Transmissions
boardgame.description:
It is easy to assume that what we see in our waking hours comprise the sum total of reality, and that the places we visit in dreams are mere phantoms, illusions conjured by our sleeping minds and nothing more. But what if that wasn't true? What if the world of our dreams were as real as our waking lives? Indeed, what if it were possible to visit these places while still lucid; to project one's mind out of one's body and into the strange vistas that lurk beyond the veil of sleep, outside of the physical world? Upon descending into the worlds of dreams and madness, what would an intrepid explorer find there? And, indeed, what would gaze back at them with cold, piscine eyes of their own?

In this game, your players will find the answers to these questions, and more. Taking on the rolls of field-agents of the quasi-official Morpheus Agency, they venture into the dreamscape on missions of exploration and espionage. As they progress, they'll encounter strange beings, glitches in the very fabric of reality, and conspiricies that reach across the void between dimensions

(Source: Product description from DriveThruRPG)

boardgame.name: Batallitas
boardgame.description:
Batallitas is a very simple wargame for two players. Its game system allows to create historical armies until the middle ages as well as fantasy armies. It is an easy game to explain and very cheap to manufacture. It is a fast game, in total about 20 minutes per battle, which aims to have more fun than being faithful to history, although it tries to find a bit of rigor within its simplicity.
The game consists of moving, and attacking and defending with dice of 6. It is surely too easy for anyone looking to recreate, but it is suitable for children.

—description from the designer

“Batallitas” es un wargame muy sencillo para dos jugadores. Su sistema de juego permite crear ejércitos históricos hasta el medievo así como ejércitos de fantasía. Es un juego fácil de explicar y muy económico de fabricar. Se trata de un juego rápido, en total unos 20 minutos por batalla, que pretende divertir más que ser fiel a la historia, aunque intenta buscar un poco de rigor dentro de su simpleza.
El juego consiste en mover, y atacar y defender con dados de 6. Seguramente es demasiado sencillo para quien busque recrear, pero es apto para niños.
—description from the designer (Spanish)

boardgame.name: Spring Falls
boardgame.description:
A puzzle game about water, erosion, and watching things grow

Manipulate the landscape and bring wildflowers to life as you make your way down a peaceful mountainside

Source: The Game Website.

boardgame.name: Idle Digging Tycoon
boardgame.description:
User Summary

Digging simulator. The player begin digging in a desert. Other levels are set in other terrains, and later on another planet.

boardgame.name: Aeon's End: Folded Space Insert
boardgame.description:
Compatible with Aeon's End, and includes space for numerous expansions, storing 840 sleeved or 1,300 unsleeved cards. Insert is also compatible with the Aeon's End: War Eternal and Aeon's End: The New Age games. The design provides both efficient storage and improved game play. Many of the trays can be utilised during the game, and they greatly aid set-up and clear-away times. The rules act as a lid on top of the trays.

Note: Insert designed for game with external box dimensions of 28.0 x 28.0 x 9.0 cm.

—description from the publisher

listing.notes: Title: Folded Space Organizer: Aeon's End Insert Publisher: Folded Space

boardgame.name: Overrun
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

A mission to re-establish contact with an exoplanet terraforming station twists from investigation to survival horror when the local xenolife becomes hostile.

Introductory Scenario: Overrun is a stand-alone adventure designed for Gatecrashing Ops team.
Campaign Play: Guidelines for Firewall, Gatecrashing, and Criminal Ops groups.
Locations: Details Teragula — an exoplanet beyond the pandora gates — its hostile marrow swamps, and the frontier terraforming outposts there.


Overrun is a 24-page adventure that can be run as an introductory scenario or as an one-off adventure in a campaign, with further ideas for plot hooks and complications.

boardgame.name: The Lake of Ill Repute
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

An ancient barrow under a lake hides danger, treasure, and improbably, romance. Designed to take characters from 1st to 5th level, with almost fifty encounters staggered in four separate sections.

Uses the rules from Heroes of Prime , but suitable for any 3/3.5 table.

boardgame.name: The Fire-Witch's Manor
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

A bandit gang's headquarters. Although the masters of the house are a 4th level sorcerer and a 3rd level bard, with only a score of common soldiers, invaders will find the manor surprisingly well-defended.

Uses the rules from Heroes of Prime , but suitable for any 3/3.5 table.

boardgame.name: The Factory
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

An encounter in the ruins of an ancient civilization. This short adventure is suitable for a single session with approximately 5th level adventurers.

Uses the rules from Heroes of Prime , but suitable for any 3/3.5 table.

boardgame.name: Haggling Friends
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

An open-air adventure derived from the Sandbox generated world of Scorpus (region F3A5). This hundred mile square area contains 16 random monsters with a story line tying them all together.

For 5th to 9th level adventurers. Uses the rules from Heroes of Prime , but suitable for any 3/3.5 table.

boardgame.name: Thunder in the Night
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

While traveling, the heroes are forced to take shelter from powerful thunderstorms, but they quickly find there’s no shelter from the worse storms of greed, desperation, and violence. Asked by a young shooting victim to save his wife from the clutches of a murderous drifter, the pals endure pouring rain, lashing winds, and the threat of being shot to prevent the young woman’s untimely demise. Meanwhile, the drifter is driven by a desire strong enough that he’s willing to risk a date with the electric chair; what could it possibly be?

Thunder in the Night is a short adventure for Midnight Boulevard: 2D6 Adventure in the World of Film Noir, which uses the rules for the Traveller SRD, and is also usable with Cepheus Engine and the Original Science Fiction Roleplaying Game.

boardgame.name: Presidio of Drago Umbra
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Your PCs are relaxing after another grueling adventure when a rider appears on the horizon. A messenger from the Horselords speeds up to you, out of breath. He carries a missive from the 3rd son of the ruler reaching out for your assistance. Back your bags, you're going back to Uvarno!

Although set in the Pangia Campaign, this adventure setting is easily adaptable to most any game and system.

boardgame.name: Holmes: Sherlock & Mycroft – Sherrinford Holmes Promo Card
boardgame.description:
Promo card available as part of the 2020 Dice Tower Kickstarter Adventurer Pack (and possibly elsewhere).

The oldest of the Holmes brothers has shown up —which allows each player to take 1 hidden clue or 2 investigation markers.

boardgame.name: Nemezis: Adventure Edition Update and One-Shot Adventure
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Nemezis was written for Savage Worlds Explorer's Edition, but the book can still be used with the Savage Worlds Adventure Edition, with very little changes. This document describes these changes (and corrects some mistakes in the Explorer's Edition).

This document contains also notes updating Galaxy: the Nemezis companion, and smaller books like Cyborgs, Cultists.

Not enough? We have included a simple one-shot adventure, using Adventure Chase rules, so that you could test it out of the box!

boardgame.name: War of Dice
boardgame.description:
War of Dice is a print&play board game designed to play in solo mode.

In War of Dice you have to face an enemy contingent, who came to conquer the world. Armies are represented by dice. Each die represents a troop, and the value of the die, which you face upwards, represents the number of health points of the troop.

​The goal is to eliminate enemy troops.

To play it you only need standard six-sided dices and print the game board on an A4 sheet.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Age of Dirt: Firepit Promo Card
boardgame.description:
A new card for Age of Dirt! It reads:

Discard this card to either
... avoid an event OR renew the To-Do-Wall.

Available as part of the 2020 Dice Tower Kickstarter Builder Pack.
